import React from "react"; import minusIcon from '../assets/minus-icon.svg' import plusIcon from '../assets/plus-icon.svg' import '../styles/CompCardCart.css' function CartCard ({imgUrl, name, price, rating, remaining, wishAmount}) { return (

{name}

Price {price} vnÄ‘

Rating: {rating}

Remaining: {remaining}

{wishAmount}

); } export default CartCard;
